name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Charles R. HORST, Sr., Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
HUTCHINSON, J., filed a dissenting opinion in which LARSEN, J., joined.
LARSEN, J., joins in this dissenting opinion.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Charles R. HORST, Sr., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
HUTCHINSON, J., filed a dissenting opinion in which LARSEN, J., joined.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
HUTCHINSON, Justice,
dissenting.
I would reverse the order of Superior Court for the reasons contained in Judge Roberts’ dissenting opinion in Commonwealth v. Charles R. Horst, Sr., 332 Pa.Superior Ct. 401, 481 A.2d 677 (1984) (Roberts, J. dissenting).
LARSEN, J., joins in this dissenting opinion.
opinions.author: HUTCHINSON, Justice,

attorneys: John E. Feather, Jr., Dist. Atty., for appellant.
John C. Tylwalk, Public Defender, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
515 A.2d 301
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Charles R. HORST, Sr., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued June 3, 1986.
Decided Sept. 25, 1986.
John E. Feather, Jr., Dist. Atty., for appellant.
John C. Tylwalk, Public Defender, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
